results.title: The Moving camera, the moving subject
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Video tech”.
This episode looks at the art of shooting movement. The composition of shots with a moving subject, such as walking room and depth of field, what happens when the subject moves, and how to deal with holding the action and combinations of movements are highlighted. Demonstrates the techniques of using a moving camera, such as tripod moves, zooming and tracking.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions

results.title: The Camera and the tripod
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Video tech”.
This episode deals with what the camera sees - focus and shot sizes, how to make pictures look better and how to zoom, pan and tilt.

results.title: Introduction to video
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Video tech”.
This introductory episode provides a basic outline of the various formats, how videotapes actually work, different sorts of video cameras - betacam, professional cams, consumer cams, the camcorder, and how to get good sound on the videotape.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions

results.title: Guitar
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Video School of Music Series”.
With this series you can be taught professionally in your own home. You can replay difficult sections and of course have the same lesson over and over again. This video takes you through the basics of guitar playing with Steve Crofts, a protege of George Goller. Rated: G
